data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Vorarlberg, Austria with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vorarlberg, Austria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Vorarlberg, Austria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 38 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Vorarlberg, Austria.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Vorarlberg, Austria, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Vorarlberg.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Afghani, general people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Vorarlberg with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 2,050 believers living in Vorarlberg, Austria.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Vorarlberg, Austria has a population of 359,700.

We estimate Vorarlberg has 2,050 people who might know Jesus, 241,561 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 116,089 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 175 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 2,050 believers in the state of Vorarlberg.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.
